summary.en: The comprehensive AI law entered into force in August 2024. Most rules for high-risk AI systems apply from August 2026 (24 months post-entry).
summary.cn: 这部全面的人工智能法律于2024年8月生效。大多数针对高风险AI系统的规则将从2026年8月起适用（生效后24个月）。

summary.en: The foundational privacy law. Recent enforcement focuses on automated decision-making and data scraping for AI training.
summary.cn: 基础隐私法律。近期的执法重点在于自动化决策和用于AI训练的数据抓取。

title.en: AI Office: GPAI Code of Practice
title.cn: AI办公室：通用人工智能行为准则

summary.en: Finalized Code of Practice for providers of general-purpose AI models, detailing transparency and copyright compliance.
summary.cn: 针对通用人工智能模型提供者的最终行为准则，详细说明了透明度和版权合规性。

summary.en: Recommendations on 'legitimate interest' as a legal basis for training AI models on personal data.
summary.cn: 关于将'合法利益'作为在个人数据上训练AI模型的法律依据的建议。

summary.en: Harmonised standards for risk management and data governance in high-risk AI systems, supporting AI Act compliance.
summary.cn: 高风险AI系统风险管理和数据治理的协调标准，支持AI法案合规。

title.cn: BfDI关于大型语言模型的立场文件

summary.en: German Federal Commissioner's stance on the 'right to be forgotten' in the context of unlearning for LLMs.
summary.cn: 德国联邦专员关于大型语言模型（LLM）背景下'被遗忘权'（遗忘学习）的立场。

content.en: The EU AI Office issued a reminder that full compliance for Annex III High-Risk AI Systems is mandatory by August 2, 2026.
content.cn: 欧盟AI办公室发布提醒，附件III高风险AI系统的全面合规必须在2026年8月2日前完成。

analysis.en: Organizations must finalize conformity assessments and register in the EU database.
analysis.cn: 组织必须完成符合性评估并在欧盟数据库中注册。

title.en: EU AI Office Guidelines on GPAI
title.cn: 欧盟AI办公室关于GPAI的指南

content.en: The EU AI Office released guidelines clarifying transparency requirements for general-purpose AI models under the AI Act.
content.cn: 欧盟AI办公室发布指南，阐明了AI法案下通用人工智能模型的透明度要求。

analysis.en: Clarifies the technical documentation obligations for foundation model providers.
analysis.cn: 阐明了基础模型提供者的技术文档义务。

content.en: The EU database for high-risk AI systems is now operational. Registration is mandatory for systems listed in Annex III.
content.cn: 欧盟高风险AI系统数据库现已投入运行。附件III中列出的系统必须进行注册。

analysis.en: Operational requirement. Companies deploying high-risk systems must register before placing on the market.
analysis.cn: 运营要求。部署高风险系统的公司必须在投放市场前进行注册。

title.en: Irish DPC Inquiry into Google AI

content.en: The Irish DPC launched an inquiry into Google's processing of personal data for the development of its AI models.
content.cn: 爱尔兰DPC对Google处理个人数据用于开发其AI模型的行为展开调查。

analysis.en: Highlights the scrutiny on legal basis (legitimate interest vs consent) for training data.
analysis.cn: 凸显了对训练数据法律依据（合法利益与同意）的审查。

content.en: CNIL imposed a €20 million fine on Clearview AI for unlawful processing of biometric data and failure to cooperate.
content.cn: CNIL因非法处理生物识别数据且不配合调查，对Clearview AI处以2000万欧元罚款。

analysis.en: Key precedent for the ban on scraping facial images for biometric identification.
analysis.cn: 禁止抓取面部图像用于生物识别的关键先例。

title.en: Meta Pauses AI Training in EU

content.en: Meta paused its plans to train AI models using public content from Facebook and Instagram users in the EU/EEA following DPC engagement.
content.cn: 在与DPC接触后，Meta暂停了使用欧盟/欧洲经济区Facebook和Instagram用户的公开内容训练AI模型的计划。

analysis.en: Demonstrates the difficulty of using 'legitimate interest' for training on user data without explicit consent.
analysis.cn: 表明在没有明确同意的情况下使用'合法利益'进行用户数据训练的困难。

content.en: DeepSeek updated its privacy policy to clarify data processing activities, amidst growing global scrutiny on Chinese AI models.
content.cn: 在全球对中国AI模型日益严格的审查中，DeepSeek更新了其隐私政策以阐明数据处理活动。

analysis.en: Reflects the need for non-EU models to align with GDPR transparency requirements.
analysis.cn: 反映了非欧盟模型需要符合GDPR透明度要求。

content.en: OpenAI implemented new privacy controls and age verification measures in Italy to address the Garante's concerns and lift the temporary ban.
content.cn: OpenAI在意大利实施了新的隐私控制和年龄验证措施，以解决Garante的担忧并解除临时禁令。

analysis.en: Established the standard for age-gating and legal basis transparency for LLMs in Europe.
analysis.cn: 确立了欧洲LLM的年龄门槛和法律依据透明度的标准。

content.en: Mistral AI released 'Mistral Large', positioning it as a compliant, high-performance European alternative.
content.cn: Mistral AI发布了'Mistral Large'，将其定位为合规、高性能的欧洲替代方案。

analysis.en: Showcases European capability to build foundation models that aim for compliance by design.
analysis.cn: 展示了欧洲构建旨在通过设计实现合规的基础模型的能力。

title.en: Council of EU approves AI Act

content.en: The Council of the EU formally adopted the Artificial Intelligence Act, setting the first comprehensive legal framework for AI.
content.cn: 欧盟理事会正式通过《人工智能法案》，制定了首个全面的人工智能法律框架。

analysis.en: The definitive legislative milestone. Compliance timelines (6, 12, 24, 36 months) started from its entry into force in August 2024.
analysis.cn: 决定性的立法里程碑。合规时间表（6、12、24、36个月）从2024年8月生效起算。

en: High-Risk AI Systems deadline (Aug 2026) is approaching. Conformity assessments must be initiated immediately.
GPAI transparency obligations are fully active. Ensure technical documentation is up to date with the latest Code of Practice.
Cross-border data transfers remain a high-risk area. Verify SCCs and supplementary measures for all non-EU data flows.
cn: 高风险AI系统截止日期（2026年8月）临近。必须立即启动符合性评估。
通用人工智能（GPAI）透明度义务已全面生效。确保技术文档符合最新的行为准则。
跨境数据传输仍是高风险领域。核实所有非欧盟数据流的SCCs和补充措施。

summary.en: Transferring EU user data to the US or other non-adequate jurisdictions without proper mechanisms (e.g., SCCs + measures) is high risk.
summary.cn: 在没有适当机制（如SCCs + 补充措施）的情况下，将欧盟用户数据传输到美国或其他非充分管辖区属于高风险。

title.cn: Meta因数据传输被罚12亿欧元

summary.en: Biometric categorization and emotion recognition in workplaces/schools are banned under the AI Act.
summary.cn: 根据AI法案，工作场所/学校中的生物识别分类和情绪识别被禁止。

summary.en: Providers must maintain detailed technical documentation and comply with EU copyright law.
summary.cn: 提供者必须维护详细的技术文档并遵守欧盟版权法。

summary.en: Strict age verification is required for AI services accessible to minors.
summary.cn: 面向未成年人的AI服务需要严格的年龄验证。

summary.en: Legitimate interest is challenged as a basis for scraping public web data for training.
summary.cn: 合法利益作为抓取公共网络数据进行训练的依据正受到挑战。
